data.message: I love ❤️ this I'm a custodian at an elementary school l've worked 21 years and the kids are my favorite part of my job! There amazing  ! Give these kids love ❤️ and kindness they will give it back! I think this young man is awesome!

replies.message: Thank you for the support, Betty!

Thank you Betty!  You are just as an important part of that school as any teacher.  When individuals (such as yourself) care for our children, the system works.  Education does not achieve its lofty goals with simple regurgitation of facts, but does by the socialization of the student with caring adults providing solid role models.
Sounds like a great job you are doing. Take care.
And you are amazing too!   M
Ya know, I'm not sure I remember every one of my teachers, but by golly I remember Mr Taylor, our school janitor when I was in the lower grades.  He was like a grandpa to all of us. ❤️ God bless you.
You know that a custodian saved the lives of an entire Kindergarten class in California. If not for his quick action, I can't even imagine the heartache.
